rules_text:
As Ironblood Trooper enters the battlefield, you may pay any amount of life. Ironblood Trooper enters the battlefield tapped with that many +1/+1 counters on it.
Mindmeld X, where X is Ironblood Trooper’s power. [i](At the beginning of combat, you may tap it to give another target creature +X/+X until end of turn.)[/i]
